Test Habit Tracker Module

class tests.test_habit_tracker.MockDataPersistence[source]

Bases: object

Class for testing data persistence. This class simulates the behavior of the DataPersistence class, allowing for testing without a real database.

delete_habit(habit_id)[source]

Delete a habit.

Parameters:

habit_id (int) – The ID of the habit to be deleted.

load_habits()[source]

Load all habits.

Returns:

A copy of the list of all habit objects.

Return type:

list

save_habit(habit)[source]

Save a habit.

Parameters:

habit (Habit) – The habit object to be saved.

Returns:

The ID of the saved habit.

Return type:

int

update_habit(habit)[source]

Update a habit.

Parameters:

habit (Habit) – The habit object with updated data.

tests.test_habit_tracker.habit_tracker(mock_db)[source]

Pytest fixture for creating a HabitTracker instance with a mock database.

Parameters:

mock_db (MockDataPersistence) – The mock data persistence instance.

Returns:

An instance of the HabitTracker class.

Return type:

HabitTracker

Pytest fixture for creating a mock database instance.

Returns:

An instance of the mock data persistence class.

Return type:

MockDataPersistence

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_add_habit(habit_tracker)[source]

Test adding a new habit to the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

The habit is added successfully with the correct attributes, and the total number of habits in the tracker is as expected.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_complete_habit(habit_tracker)[source]

Test completing a habit in the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

The habit is marked as completed and the completion date is recorded.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_delete_habit_not_found(habit_tracker)[source]

Test attempting to delete a habit that does not exist in the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

The method returns None and no habits are deleted.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_delete_habit_success(habit_tracker)[source]

Test deleting an existing habit from the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

The habit is deleted successfully and is no longer present in the list of habits.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_get_all_habits(habit_tracker)[source]

Test retrieving all habits from the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

All habits added to the tracker are retrieved correctly.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_get_habit_by_id(habit_tracker)[source]

Test retrieving a habit by its ID from the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

The habit is retrieved correctly by its ID. Returns None for a non-existent habit ID.

tests.test_habit_tracker.test_get_habits_by_periodicity(habit_tracker)[source]

Test retrieving habits by their periodicity from the HabitTracker.

Parameters:

habit_tracker (HabitTracker) – The habit tracker instance to use for the test.

Asserts:

Habits are correctly filtered and retrieved by their periodicity.
